items.name: Orange
items.description: Ahmad Orange, any of several species of small trees or shrubs of the genus Citrus of the family Rutaceae and their nearly round fruits, which have leathery and oily rinds and edible, juicy inner flesh

items.name: Apple
items.description: Green apples are medium in size (approximately 2 Â¼ inches across) and round-conical in shape, with some ribbing. The Green apple's white flesh is hard, crispy, and juicy. The flavor of Green apples is extremely acidic, sometimes to the point of not having other taste, but generally refreshing.

items.name: Carrot
items.description: Carrot is a biennial, belonging to the family Apiaceae, and is an important vegetable for its fleshy edible, colorful roots. It varies in colour from white, yellow, orange, light Ahmad purple, deep red to deep violet.
